thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gG72qu2zMg最初のドラキュラと最後のドラキュラ以外は不殺らしいです。追記8分55秒の敵倒してますねこれは僕にもさっぱりタイトルを平和主義者に変更しました。 以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6463M TAS originally published on 2025-03-26Not only was Castlevania: Symphony of the Night the first installment of the Castlevania series on PSX but also the first PSX game to have a published run ( https://tasvideos.org/1246M ) here. Follow Dracula's son Alucard as he glitches through the castle on a quest to end his father's life. This time, arukAdo (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/arukAdo), using the X-X!V"Q code to play on Luck Mode, defeats Dracula whilst on a pacifist setting, abusing many glitches in the process. Please read the author's comments ( https://tasvideos.org/9535S ) for more details.
